nodes.text: Boro-borosa III was a planet in the Boro-borosa system with three suns. The system was a minor Garonnin possession with mining operations in three asteroid belts and the planetary ring. It was rumored to be home to a fabled lost treasure left by Hutt Royalty or the Rakatan Infinite Empire.

The Darparu Water Federation supplied an amount of hydrate to the mining companies of Boro-borosa III. Their prisoners would be sent to the nearby planet of Atron, which was known throughout the galaxy for its prisons.
